messages.title: A future fair for all
messages.content: At this election you have a big choice between a future fair for all with Labour or a return to a failed Tory past.

messages.title: Tories: A change I can't afford
messages.content: A change South Liverpool can't afford

messages.title: Only Labour or the Tories can win.
messages.content: Vote for a fairer future. Vote Labour.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour has invested £millions into our health service.
All schools in South Liverpool and Halewood benefit from Labour's investment.
The Pension Credit, Winter Fuel Allowance, free bus passes and free TV licences are all Labour measures.
Labour's Sure Start schemes help the families most in need.
Labour's investment is helping the economic development.
Labour has invested to support our local police.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Only Labour or the Tories can win.

issues.economy: End to regeneration and £millions of investment in Liverpool withdrawn under Tory government.
issues.education: The Tories would cut back on opportunities for young people meaning fewer chances in education and training post 16.
issues.health: NHS starved of investment and new Royal Hospital not fit for the patients despite economic recovery.
issues.socialWelfare: Sure Start Children's Centres a thing of the past.

housing.content: End to regeneration and £millions of investment in Liverpool withdrawn under Tory government.

contactInformation.address: Freepost RRLU-HZLK-JELC, Maria Eagle, Unit House, Speke Boulevard, L24 9HZ

images.caption: Images related to the key policies such as supporting the NHS, schools, pensioners, families, regeneration, and the police.
Graph showing electoral competition from previous general election.
